Name: Café Marcella
Review Text: Stopped along this charming neighborhood cafe in for a cup of coffee along the canal way. Staff was friendly and service was fast . Good cup of coffee too.

Name: Café Marcella
Review Text: One of our favorite spots in Amsterdam. It's across from a park so we can sit, eat, drink, and watch the kids play. The menu is decent with a variety of sandwiches. The salads are huge and make for a filling meal. …

Name: Café Marcella
Review Text: Lovely cafe next to the canal. Very romantic and cozy. Snacks are good, wine,beer and tasty cocktails. It is not expensive at all. More local than tourist vibe.

Name: Café Marcella
Review Text: Good food, staff with an amazing view of the canals.

Name: Café Marcella
Review Text: Had a really nice lunch at the cafe during the rain. Nice food, nice service, would return again.

Name: Café Marcella
Review Text: Great and relaxed neighbourhood spot. Traditional dutch brown cafe on a quiet square totally local with good bitterballs and cold beer.

Name: Café Marcella
Review Text: We stopped by here for breakfast and enjoyed ourselves. Pancakes were fresh and authentic. Coffee was yummy. Lots of bacon! Orange juice was freshly made. It's a great location too - right on the canal. It's also great for drinks and …

Name: Café Marcella
Review Text: A delicious breakfast, the taste wasn't what I'd describe as strong or spicy, it was actually soft, and it goes amazingly well with the calm environment and tranquility of the place and City, the restaurant is in an Amsterdam's typical architecture house,

Name: Café Marcella
Review Text: Lovely little place next to a canal on Prinsengracht. I had the French red wine. Looooved it. Definitely going for another visit soon.

Name: Café Marcella
Review Text: Great terras with views over the channel livelihood and great bitterballen

Name: Café Marcella
Review Text: Amazing, charming, tasty as hell. Highly recommended

Name: Café Marcella
Review Text: Our favourite breakfast place in the city after 7 days! Large menu with many options, good portions, excellent bacon and coffee and nice typical Amsterdam view with a bustle and the canal. They have heaters when it's a little chilly too. Highly recommend.

Name: Café Marcella
Review Text: beautiful place to enjoying​ your brunch, especially in Spring

Name: Café Marcella
Review Text: Nice place for a drink outside by the canal.

Name: Café Marcella
Review Text: Nice local bar for a quick pint after work. It's small and cozy inside but it has a good heated outside space. They have the usual choice of industrial Dutch/Belgian beers so do not expect too much in that sense. Borrel food is cheap and of reasonable quality.

Name: Café Marcella
Review Text: Cosy neighbourhood bar with a nice open view to the neighbouring square - this is a great spot to sit down outside under the canopy with the heating lamps on during winter and enjoy a warm drink or beer! …

Name: Café Marcella
Review Text: Lovely food and friendly service.

Name: Café Marcella
Review Text: A cozy Café/Bar in the corner of this quiet Amstelveld park. Good to enjoy a coffee in a more relaxed way. They also serve food.

Name: Café Marcella
Review Text: Love this charming little corner cafe. We had a fantastic breakfast here on our last morning in Amsterdam and can't wait to go back! They're also open late every night if that's more your thing.

Name: Café Marcella
Review Text: Its a nice little place tucked away in a corner offering a beautiful view of the adjoining canal. The staff is so friendly and you get a comfortable feeling. Guaranteed to have a good time.

Name: Café Marcella
Review Text: Lovely place, really friendly staff and yummy food. I am a tourist so was in need of some advice on where to visit and staff were more than happy to give me suggestions. In the evening time this becomes a lively bar with a warm atmosphere. I recommend this place for breakfast, lunch and drinks to start your night.

Name: Café Marcella
Review Text: Oh was the food bad or what. We ordered cheese and ham plate and it was inedible. The salad was ok but also not great, greens we're wilted and the overall flavor was meh. …

Name: Café Marcella
Review Text: Visited this cafe shortly after arriving in Amsterdam for a quick snack. Got our holiday off to a good start. Friendly service, charming surroundings and good, simple food.

Name: Café Marcella
Review Text: Nice terrace on the canals for a Sunday afternoon drink and snack. I'd recommend a La Chouffe beer with bitterballen. The rest of the menu is of poor quality.  Though it's a typical Amsterdam bar..

Name: Café Marcella
Review Text: Beautiful old Amsterdam kafé in a great location

Name: Café Marcella
Review Text: Great place to get lunch.

Name: Café Marcella
Review Text: Very cosy café, near the canal. Good music and a very polite smiling lady at the service. Easily accessible on foot or tram.

Name: Café Marcella
Review Text: Open earlier than a few of the nearby cafes and making delicious toasties and lattes earned Cafe Marcella my business 2 or 3 times during a week long visit.

Name: Café Marcella
Review Text:
Lovely Cafe with small food/snack choices,  terrace on a vivid square and on the canal. Mostly Dutch people with the occasional tourist.
Worth a visit

Name: Café Marcella
Review Text: Great little spot. Small but quirky. The lady working was very friendly and helpful. Got breakfast here and it was delicious and reasonably priced.

Name: Café Marcella

Name: Café Marcella

Name: Café Marcella
Review Text: Went for breakfast here. Good service, delicious food. Recommend the eggs and bacon!

Review Text: Great views, fantastic choices on the menu, super friendly and professional staff. What a great place to watch Amsterdam pass by!

Name: Café Marcella
Review Text: Great service and the best bitterballen we found in Amsterdam! We'd definitely go back here again.

Name: Café Marcella
